description: Modifications to the previously approved Listed Building Consent P112392 involving the positioning of the two steel stairway within front lightwell. Alterations to the front including the inclusion of new surface mounted painted metal post box on existing front side wall of No.90 Arnwell Street and 2 new access gates within front boundary treatment matching existing railings; alteration of rear door on approved single storey rear extension to new double glazed conservation entrance doors (traditional style) and lowering of existing window cil on lower ground rear wall to create new glazed door; together with associated landscaping works involving 2 private terrace areas, communal garden and proposed timber pergola; as well as internal alterations to the lower and ground floor comprising new fitted joinery, partition configuration of the kitchen, bedroom and living room space at lower ground and ground floor level of both properties including new partitions at No.88 (lower ground to create bathroom and new kitchen [separate Planning application reference P2013/3189/FUL also submitted]
decision_conditions:
3 YEAR CONSENT PERIOD FOR LBC and CAC: The works hereby permitted shall be begun not later than three years from the date of this consent.

REASON: To comply with the provisions of Section 18(1)(a) of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 as amended by the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004 (Chapter 5).
